content:
Hmm so, when editing rustc at least, i'm not finding that "format on save" is working. I've got the vscode option enabled. I'm not sure why this might be? Something I can look to ..?

Also, is it possible to configure the path to rustfmt that rust-analyzer uses?
Also, is "format on save" functionality implemented in the LSP server, or the vscode plugin?
Ah, I might not have had the extension setup on this particular ssh host

The option to override rustfmt is “rust-analyzer.rustfmt.overrideCommand”.

The general “reformat” functionality is in LSP, “format on save” is how an
editor might choose to expose this functionality.
